title: BOYA’s Mini Wireless Microphone is Extremely Portable, and Extra-Affordable
description: It comes with features such as 48kHz/16-bit sampling rate, AI-based noise cancellation, and up to 30 hours of battery life. The post BOYA’s Mini Wireless Microphone is Extremely Portable, and Extra-Affordable appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
